programmes.show_description: Join Nick Chicane for a deep dive into Balearic Beats. From day parties at Space to Cafe Del Mar sunsets and pulsing nights at Privilege revisit the tunes that defined an era.
Dive into a world of uplifting melodies, driving beats and breakdowns to give you shivers! This is Euphoria at its finest.
Back to the '90s as we hit you with the 50 greatest Eurodance anthems ever. Get your party started right here, right now!
Massive tunes and huge anthems. Each track a chart topping No.1 dance hit! This is the best of the best, these are the legends.
Let us take you on a journey of huge hits, banging club classics, amazing anthems and a few curve balls! These are the 100 biggest selling dance tunes of the 90s.
Need a fix of 90s club classics? Lock in for a marathon of memories as we take you back to the greatest decade of dance! The 90s!
Everybody's free to feel good and Rozalla knows it! So let's join her as she takes us on a journey of her 40 favourite feel good anthems from back in the day.

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Join Nick Chicane for an immersive journey through 30 ultimate sundown anthems. With Moby, Orbital, Enigma and of course, Chicane. Turn on and chill out.
Dive into a world of uplifting melodies, driving beats and breakdowns to give you shivers! This is Euphoria at its finest.
Join Stephanie Hirst as she spins some awesome belters! From 2000 to 2009! Here's the lowdown on her fav 3 tracks of each year.
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the noughties!
Build ups to die for, Breakdowns to cry for! These are the 50 biggest Euphoric tunes of all time. Turn this up and get ready for the drop!
Let's go way back with some classic throwback hits, long forgotten beats and some good old fashioned rave anthems!
From 2 Unlimited to Tinie Tempah - in order! Here are 25 years of UK smash number 1s that you may have forgotten.
Steph gives us her low down on every thing Eurodance. She's hand-picked 40 absolute bangers so expect: Haddaway, Jam & Spoon, Gala, Livin' Joy and a whole continent more!
Melodic synths, pumping beats and shout out loud lyrics. Live your best life with some Eurodance NRG!
We spinback 3 decades to the birth of Eurodance, the 90s. With Snap, Haddaway, Ace of Base, Alice Deejay and more! A decade of dance awaits.
Kiss FM favourite Bam Bam is back once again, firing up 25 of the greatest dance covers ever to grace a dance floor! Featuring Eric Prydz, DJ Sammy and Jonas Blue!

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Join Cascada's leading lady Natalie Horler as she talks us through all of Cascada's Dance Anthems. From 2004 - you won't want to miss this!

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
An hour of the greatest party anthems ever. Happy times guaranteed! No room for moody people here!

programmes.show_name: Opening Track of Every Clubland CD
programmes.show_description: These are the opening tracks from every numbered Clubland CD, 1 to 28. There are a lot of surprises here!

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Rave culture ignited in the early 90s, let us take you back to the harder edge of the scene. Lots of frantic breakbeats, manic basslines and a load of bleeps!
